short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FREE※※※OFFLINE※※※EASY※※※SUPPORTS: Page URL, Image Address, Hyperlink and Selected Text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QR Code Helper is a useful tool to easily generate QR Code image from page URL, hyperlink or selected text on page.

Right click on hyperlink, image, selected text on page to create QR Code.

Click button on Chrome toolbar to create QR code from selected text on page or current page URL .
